<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataFI extends data { const CODE = 'FI'; const PREFIX = 358; const REGION = 'Europe'; const PATTERNS = array( '[1-35689]\d{4}|7\d{10,11}|(?:[124-7]\d|3[0-46-9])\d{8}|[1-9]\d{5,8}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:1[3-79][1-8]|[235689][1-8]\d)\d{2,6}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:4[0-8]|50)\d{4,8}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '800\d{4,6}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '[67]00\d{5,6}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{5})'=>'$1', '(\d)(\d{4,9})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{6})'=>'$1', '(\d{3})(\d{3,7})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{2})(\d{4,8})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{2})(\d{6,10})'=>'$1 $2', ); }
